item.title: Baldur’s Gate 4 Was in Development and in Partially Playable State Before Larian Scrapped the Project - Wccftech
item.description:
1. Baldur’s Gate 4 Was in Development and in Partially Playable State Before Larian Scrapped the Project  Wccftech

  3. The scrapped Baldur's Gate 3 add-on was playable when Larian canned it, and director Swen Vincke has some salt for the wound: "It's something you all would have liked"  Gamesradar
  4. Baldur's Gate 4 Was Already Partially Playable Before It Was Scrapped  TheGamer
  5. Larian Reveals Why It Decided Not to Make Baldur's Gate 4  GameRant
